title: Hakone Hotel
provenance: Dealer: St. Jivago Desanges, P.O. Box 24 AA2, Los Angeles, CA 90024 (ph: 213/931-1984)
description:
Luggage label depicting buildings along a lake shore, most notably, a large white structure with rounded arch windows. A yellow Mt. Fuji looms in the background.
Text across top: HAKONE HOTEL / HAKONE LAKE-SIDE, JAPAN
name: Print
